Interface LoggingInterface

All Known Subinterfaces:
CommanderInterface, Entity, FlowControlInterface, PersistenceInterface, PropertiesInterface, QueryExecutorInterface
All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseCommander, Batch, ConnectionPool, DeleteStatement, FlowControl, GroupByStatement, InsertStatement, jfxApp, OrderByKeyword, PropertiesAndArguments, Query, QueryExecutor, QueryResult, SelectStatement, UpdateStatement, WhereClause
public interface LoggingInterface
Convenient way to access Logger from interfaces.
